content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <OpenSearchDescription xmlns="http://a9.com/-/spec/opensearch/1.1/" xmlns:geo="http://a9.com/-/opensearch/extensions/geo/1.0/" xmlns:eum="http://a9.com/-/opensearch/extensions/eumetsat/1.0/">  <ShortName>EUMETSAT Product Navigator</ShortName>  <Description>The EUMETSAT Product Navigator is the central data discovery service for all EUMETSAT data and products, including third-party products disseminated via EUMETCast.</Description>  <Tags>EUMETSAT meteorology satellite weather climate terraCatalog CSW catalogue service</Tags>  <Contact>$MAILING_ADMIN</Contact>   <Url type="application/vnd.google-earth.kml+xml" template="$WEBAPP_SERVER_URL/OpenSearch?q={searchTerms}&pw={startPage?}&bbox={geo:box?}&dtstart={time:start?}&dtend={time:end?}&cat={eum:category?}&pp={eum:productProvider?}&dis={eum:dissemination?}&ins={eum:instrument?}&sat={eum:satellite?}&uL={eum:useLimitation?}&format=kml"/>  <Url type="application/atom+xml" template="$WEBAPP_SERVER_URL/OpenSearch?q={searchTerms}&pw={startPage?}&bbox={geo:box?}&dtstart={time:start?}&dtend={time:end?}&cat={eum:category?}&pp={eum:productProvider?}&dis={eum:dissemination?}&ins={eum:instrument?}&sat={eum:satellite?}&uL={eum:useLimitation?}&format=atom"/>  <Url type="application/atom+xml" template="$WEBAPP_SERVER_URL/OpenSearch?id={geo:uid}&format=atom"/>   <Url type="application/rss+xml" template="$WEBAPP_SERVER_URL/OpenSearch?q={searchTerms}&pw={startPage?}&bbox={geo:box?}&dtstart={time:start?}&dtend={time:end?}&cat={eum:category?}&pp={eum:productProvider?}&dis={eum:dissemination?}&ins={eum:instrument?}&sat={eum:satellite?}&uL={eum:useLimitation?}&format=rss"/>  <LongName>terraCatalog geospatial resource search engine</LongName>  <Image height="75" width="155" type="image/png">terraCatalog_feed.png</Image>  <Image height="14" width="14" type="image/png">feed-icon-14x14.png</Image>  <Query role="example" searchTerms="metadata"/>  <Developer>sdi-suite Development Team</Developer>  <!-- enter any copyright remarks in the optional attribution element --> <!--  <Attribution></Attribution> -->  <SyndicationRight>open</SyndicationRight>  <AdultContent>false</AdultContent>  <Language>*</Language>  <OutputEncoding>UTF-8</OutputEncoding>  <InputEncoding>UTF-8</InputEncoding> </OpenSearchDescription>
